text: Sandra B. Zellmer is an American lawyer currently the Robert B. Daugherty Professor of Law at University of Nebraska–Lincoln College of Law and formerly holding the Hevelone Research Chair (2006-2007) and McCollum Research Chair (2008-2009). ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:University of Nebraska faculty Category:American lawyers Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Sandra Zellmer
